entries.meaning: (dated) Homosexuality, the state of being homosexual.
examples: He was also a secret preacher of homosexualism; throughout his long literary career he, from time to time, as opportunities presented themselves, made subtle and votive references to homosexual orientation in his creative works.

entries.meaning: (derogatory) A purported ideology behind (and promoting) homosexuality; gayness viewed as an ideology rather than a sexual orientation.
